title: Zeke picks up new object and puts in mouth Piaget

content.prompt: Zeke is attempting to learn more about his world. When he encounters a new object, he picks it up and puts it in his mouth. Zeke is most likely in which of Jean Piagetâ€™s stages of cognitive development?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
